SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_HELM_ADDITIONAL_FLAGS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_HELM_CMD# = "&UC4RB_HELM_CMD# &UC4RB_HELM_ADDITIONAL_FLAGS#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_HELM_VALUE_FILE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_HELM_CMD# = "&UC4RB_HELM_CMD# --values &UC4RB_HELM_VALUE_FILE#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_HELM_WAIT_UTIL_DONE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_HELM_CMD# = "&UC4RB_HELM_CMD# --wait" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_HELM_INSTALL_TIMEOUT# <= 0 : SET &UC4RB_HELM_CMD# = "&UC4RB_HELM_CMD# --timeout 300s" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_HELM_CMD# = "&UC4RB_HELM_CMD# --timeout &UC4RB_HELM_INSTALL_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_HELM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HELM_CMD# , "s"); :ENDIF
